alert.note: Alert for Plymouth; Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 11:48PM CDT until May 11 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Woodbury County in west central Iowa... Central Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1147 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sioux City, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hinton around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Merrill and Le Mars. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
